abstract: A Georgia man has been arrested in connection with the sale of fake horror-movie posters and lobby cards.
snippet: A Georgia man has been arrested in connection with the sale of fake horror-movie posters and lobby cards.
lead_paragraph: A counterfeiting scandal that been rocking the close-knit world of movie poster collectors grew more serious on Wednesday, as federal authorities arrested Kerry T. Haggard, a Georgia-based dealer, on mail fraud charges related to the sale of fake horror-movie posters and lobby cards.

headline.main: Georgia Man Arrested in Sale of Fake Movie Posters

abstract: To offset inconsistent cellular service, users have resorted to making calls from different locations and investing in microcell hardware.
snippet: To offset inconsistent cellular service, users have resorted to making calls from different locations and investing in microcell hardware.
lead_paragraph: Owners of iPhones know that their love for Steve Jobs’s touch-screen marvel comes at a price. The iPhone’s cellular coverage, provided exclusively by AT&T Wireless, is notoriously spotty. In some parts of New York and San Francisco, it’s impossible to connect.

headline.main: Dead Zone Doldrums Test Skills of iPhone Customers
headline.print_headline: Dead Zone Doldrums Test Skills Of iPhone Customers

abstract: Bank of America named DuPont’s longtime chief executive, Charles O. Holliday Jr., as its chairman, succeeding Walter E. Massey.
snippet: Bank of America named DuPont’s longtime chief executive, Charles O. Holliday Jr., as its chairman, succeeding Walter E. Massey.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America named DuPont’s longtime chief executive, Charles O. Holliday Jr., as its chairman on Wednesday, Reuters reports. He succeeds Walter E. Massey, who retired from the board after reaching the mandatory retirement age of 72.

headline.main: Bank of America Names a New Chairman
